title: MentorMe Data Schema v3
description: Schema for MentorMe app data export/storage format version 3. This version adds sortOrder field to goals and habits for drag-and-drop reordering. IMPORTANT: When modifying this schema, ensure corresponding Dart models are updated. See lib/services/backup_service.dart for export format implementation. See CLAUDE.md 'Data Schema Management' section for full synchronization checklist.

schemaVersion.description: Data schema version - must be 3 for this schema

exportDate.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when backup was created

appVersion.description: App version that created this backup

goals.description: JSON-encoded array of goals (each with sortOrder field)

habits.description: JSON-encoded array of habits (each with sortOrder field)

pulse_types.description: JSON-encoded array of pulse type definitions

chat_conversations.description: JSON-encoded array of AI chat conversations

mentor_messages.description: JSON-encoded array of mentor coaching messages

custom_templates.description: JSON-encoded array of custom journal templates

sessions.description: JSON-encoded array of structured journaling sessions

enabled_templates.description: JSON-encoded array of enabled template IDs

journalEntry_v3.description: Structure of a journal entry in v3 (unchanged from v2). Dart Model: lib/models/journal_entry.dart. Export: lib/services/backup_service.dart (journal_entries field).

content.description: REQUIRED for all entry types. For structuredJournal, this is auto-generated from structuredData.

structuredData.description: For structuredJournal entries, contains the form data

content.description: Structured journals MUST have non-empty content

goal_v3.description: Structure of a goal in v3 (adds sortOrder). Dart Model: lib/models/goal.dart. Export: lib/services/backup_service.dart (goals field).

status.description: One of: GoalStatus.active, GoalStatus.backlog, GoalStatus.completed, GoalStatus.abandoned

sortOrder.description: Position within the status group for drag-and-drop reordering

habit_v3.description: Structure of a habit in v3 (adds sortOrder). Dart Model: lib/models/habit.dart. Export: lib/services/backup_service.dart (habits field).

status.description: One of: HabitStatus.active, HabitStatus.backlog, HabitStatus.completed, HabitStatus.abandoned

sortOrder.description: Position within the status group for drag-and-drop reordering

changes: Added content field requirement for structuredJournal entries
Content is now auto-generated from structuredData during migration
Format: 'emoji name\n\nField: Value' for better display in journal list
Added sortOrder field to goals for drag-and-drop reordering within status groups
Added sortOrder field to habits for drag-and-drop reordering within status groups
sortOrder is auto-assigned during migration based on current order
